name: Don't Waste Your Time (Edvaldo Melquiades)
description:
Race against time through three challenging scenarios.

Precision and speed will be needed to get the trophy in the last stage in less than 20 seconds.

This game was created for the 20 Second Game Jam.

How to play: 

Collect three cherries to unlock access to the next stage. You will have 20 seconds to reach the final stage.

Controls:

  • LeftArrow or A to move left.
  • RightArrow or D to move right.
  • Space to jump
